Griel's Quest for the Holy Porron
name: Griel's Quest for the Holy Porrón
overview: Legend has it that long, long ago, in the kingdom of Isteriah lived a King, loved as much for his way of governing as for his festivals. After a lazy night and waking up from the sunlight of mid-afternoon and a ghastly headache worthy of a good hangover, King Notah discovers that the night before disappeared his most precious treasure the Holy Porrón, well…. Y also his daughter. With all this mess he called the only person who could go in search and retrieve it from the hands of his arch enemy Kbrah, that person was nothing more and nothing less than Griel, a boy who enjoyed the confidence of King Notah, his reasons would have. And what King does not want the best for his kingdom? For it and for it I needed to get the Holy Porron back. On the other hand ... What father does not want the best for his daughter? For it "and for this reason" he would give her in marriage to that hero who would recover and bring back his most precious asset and what else he cared in this world, the Holy Porrón…. And well... your daughter.
